citation.article-title: Skermanella xinjiangensis sp. nov., isolated from the desert of Xinjiang, China.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Skermanella xinjiangensis sp. nov.
Skermanella xinjiangensis (xin.jiang.en′sis. N.L. fem. adj. xinjiangensis pertaining to Xinjiang, an autonomous region in north-west China).
Cells are Gram-negative, aerobic, rod-shaped and motile by means of a single polar or subpolar flagellum.
Cells are approximately 0.8–0.9 μm×1.1–1.6 μm in size.
Cells grow best on nutrient-reduced media such as 0.1×TSB agar or R2A.
Colonies on 0.1×TSB agar are circular, convex and light-pink-coloured.
Growth occurs on 0.1×TSB agar at 17–37 °C, pH 6–9 and 0–4 % NaCl.
The optimum temperature for growth is 28–37 °C and the optimum pH is pH 7–8.
Poly-β-hydroxybutyrate granules are produced.
Positive for catalase and oxidase.
Does not hydrolyse casein, chitin, tyrosine, cellulose, starch or Tween 80.
Positive in tests for urea hydrolysis, aesculin hydrolysis and β-galactosidase activity.
Negative for nitrate reduction, indole production, glucose fermentation, arginine dihydrolase and gelatin hydrolysis (API 20 NE).
Assimilates d-glucose, l-arabinose, d-mannitol, malic acid, propionic acid, 3-hydroxybutyric acid, l-proline, l-rhamnose, d-ribose, sodium acetate and lactic acid (API 20NE and API ID 32 GN).

Does not assimilate N-acetylglucosamine, maltose, capric acid, adipic acid, trisodium citrate, phenylacetic acid, salicin, melibiose, l-fucose, d-sorbitol, valeric acid, l-histidine, potassium 2-ketogluconate, 4-hydroxybenzoic acid, inositol, sucrose, itaconic acid, suberic acid, sodium malonate, l-alanine, potassium 5-ketogluconate, glycogen, 3-hydroxybenzoic acid or l-serine (API 20NE and API ID 32 GN).

Ferments d-arabinose, l-arabinose, d-ribose, d-xylose, l-xylose, d-galactose, d-glucose, d-mannose, l-rhamnose, d-mannitol, aesculin, cellobiose (weakly), d-lactose (weakly), melibiose, d-lyxose (weakly), d-fucose and l-fucose (weakly), but does not ferment glycerol, erythritol, d-adonitol, methyl β-d-xylopyranoside, d-fructose, l-sorbose, dulcitol, inositol, d-sorbitol, methyl α-d-mannopyranoside, methyl α-d-glucopyranoside, N-acetylglucosamine, amygdalin, arbutin, salicin, maltose, sucrose, trehalose, inulin, melezitose, raffinose, starch, glycogen, xylitol, gentiobiose, turanose, d-tagatose, d-arabitol, l-arabitol, potassium gluconate, potassium 2-ketogluconate or potassium 5-ketogluconate (API 50 CH strips).
The major respiratory lipoquinone is Q-10.
The major fatty acids are C18 : 1ω7c and C16 : 0.
The type strain, 10-1-101T (=CCTCC AB 207153T=NRRL B-51273T), was isolated from the surface layer of a desert soil from Xinjiang, China.
The G+C content of the genomic DNA of the type strain is 68.8 mol%.
